text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Paüions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>fl. 2.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stahiii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>32. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistl.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Krancken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>48. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hauü-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>40. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"Corrections made:
1) Fixed a mismatched tag: changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> so all price elements are consistent and properly closed.
2) Escaped literal ampersands in titles (& -> &) to make the XML well-formed.
3) Removed stray/garbled Unicode artifact characters (U+221A and U+2020) that appeared in the original text as unintended symbols.
4) Added an XML declaration (<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>).
5) Reformatted/indented the XML for readability and ensured all elements are properly nested.  
Note: I did not attempt substantive editorial corrections of historical orthography (only removed obvious artifact characters)."}

parsed.explanation:
Corrections made:
1) Fixed a mismatched tag: changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> so all price elements are consistent and properly closed.
2) Escaped literal ampersands in titles (& -> &) to make the XML well-formed.
3) Removed stray/garbled Unicode artifact characters (U+221A and U+2020) that appeared in the original text as unintended symbols.
4) Added an XML declaration (<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>).
5) Reformatted/indented the XML for readability and ensured all elements are properly nested.  
Note: I did not attempt substantive editorial corrections of historical orthography (only removed obvious artifact characters).
